actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To provide funds to State courts for the provision of legal representation to parents and legal guardians with respect to child welfare cases.
short_title: Enhancing the Quality of Parental Legal Representation Act of 2011

summary.text: Enhancing the Quality of Parental Legal Representation Act of 2011 - Amends title IV (Temporary Aid to Needy Families) (TANF) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to make grants to the highest state courts to enable them to provide legal representation for parents and legal guardians with respect to child welfare cases. Increases funding for discretionary and targeted grants.

titles.title: Enhancing the Quality of Parental Legal Representation Act of 2011
To provide funds to State courts for the provision of legal representation to parents and legal guardians with respect to child welfare cases.
